The Social Context of Aging: Global
I received certificate of G*STEP at the University of North Texas in 2014. This program purposes to
prepare graduate students to teach in higher education. Students are required to attend and pass four live
and eight online workshops, and complete four practicums (more information is available at
Ingman, S. R., Wolfe, L., Amini, R., Driver, N., Ewing, C., & Huang, C.-L. J. (2015). Societal
Benefits and Challenges of Sustainable Buildings and their Ecosystems for Aging Populations. In
Y. X. Tao (Ed.), Analytics for Building-Scale Sustainable Ecosystems: Begell House.
2. Amini, R. (2009). Health Needs Assessment Methodology in Healthcare Systems: JMERC.
